verses.text: Nineveh! \w The|strong="H3605"\w* destroyer \w has|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H5674"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* guard \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rampart; \w watch|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* road; brace \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w*; strengthen \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w might|strong="H2022"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* utmost.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* restoring \w the|strong="H6440"\w* majesty \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jacob \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel, though \w the|strong="H6440"\w* devastators \w have|strong="H5921"\w* plundered \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* destroyed \w their|strong="H6440"\w* vines.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* shields \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* warriors \w are|strong="H3478"\w* dyed red, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* soldiers \w are|strong="H3478"\w* clothed \w in|strong="H3478"\w* scarlet, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* chariots gleam \w like|strong="H3478"\w* fire \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day \w he|strong="H3588"\w* prepares \w for|strong="H3588"\w* battle spears \w are|strong="H3478"\w* shaken.

\w Chariots|strong="H7393"\w* rush across \w the|strong="H3117"\w* fields, storm through \w the|strong="H3117"\w* squares; \w they|strong="H3117"\w* flame \w like|strong="H4043"\w* \w torches|strong="H6393"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* dart \w like|strong="H4043"\w* lightening.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* leader rallies \w his|strong="H1984"\w* nobles, \w they|strong="H7323"\w* hurl themselves forward. \w They|strong="H7323"\w* speed \w on|strong="H7323"\w* toward \w the|strong="H1984"\w* wall; \w the|strong="H1984"\w* storming-shield \w is|strong="H4758"\w* set up.
\w The|strong="H2142"\w* water-gates \w are|strong="H3782"\w* thrown open, \w and|strong="H4116"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* palace dissolves \w in|strong="H3559"\w* ruins.

\w The|strong="H6605"\w* queen \w is|strong="H5104"\w* stripped, she \w is|strong="H5104"\w* carried \w off|strong="H6605"\w*. \w Her|strong="H6605"\w* maids moan like doves, beating upon their breasts.

\w Like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pool \w of|strong="H6963"\w* water \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5324"\w*, \w her|strong="H1540"\w* waters fast ebbing \w away|strong="H1540"\w*. “\w Stand|strong="H5324"\w* firm! \w Stand|strong="H5324"\w* firm!” someone \w cries|strong="H6963"\w*, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H5927"\w* \w one|strong="H5324"\w* \w turns|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H5927"\w*.

“Loot \w the|strong="H3117"\w* silver, loot \w the|strong="H3117"\w* gold, \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H5975"\w* end \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* treasure, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* wealth \w and|strong="H3117"\w* precious \w things|strong="H1992"\w*.”

Nineveh \w is|strong="H3701"\w* empty, desolate, devastated, \w with|strong="H3627"\w* faint heart \w and|strong="H3701"\w* knocking knee. \w There|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* weakness \w in|strong="H3701"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* limb, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* faces grow pale.

Where now \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* den \w of|strong="H6440"\w* lions? Where now \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lair \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* young? Where \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lion \w used|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* withdraw, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* cubs, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* disturb \w them|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w The|strong="H8033"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* tore enough \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w cubs|strong="H1482"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* strangled prey \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w lionesses|strong="H3833"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* filled \w his|strong="H1980"\w* caves \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* kill, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* filled \w his|strong="H1980"\w* lairs \w with|strong="H1980"\w* fresh meat.

“But see, \w I|strong="H1767"\w* am against \w you|strong="H1767"\w*,” \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* hosts declares, “\w I|strong="H1767"\w* will burn \w your|strong="H4390"\w* chariots \w in|strong="H2963"\w* smoke \w and|strong="H3833"\w* fire. \w The|strong="H4390"\w* sword will devour \w your|strong="H4390"\w* \w young|strong="H3833"\w* \w lions|strong="H3833"\w*. \w You|strong="H1767"\w* will never again \w prey|strong="H2964"\w* \w on|strong="H1767"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* land. No more will \w your|strong="H4390"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4390"\w* be heard.”
